testimonials.quote: Finally, a color tool that understands accessibility. The auto-contrast feature alone saves us hours every week.
We switched from HSL to OKLCH thanks to this tool. The perceptual uniformity makes such a difference.
The best palette generator I've used. Dark mode support out of the box is a game changer.

pricing-1.title: Simple pricing
pricing-1.subtitle: Start free, upgrade when you need more.

items.question: What is OKLCH and why should I use it?
items.answer: OKLCH is a perceptually uniform color space. Unlike HSL, colors with the same lightness value actually appear equally bright to human eyes, making it ideal for creating consistent design systems.

items.question: Can I export to Tailwind CSS?
items.answer: Yes! Pro users can export palettes directly to Tailwind config format, including CSS variables and theme extensions.

items.question: How does auto-contrast work?
items.answer: Our algorithm automatically calculates WCAG-compliant contrast ratios and adjusts text colors to ensure readability on any background.

items.question: Is there a Figma plugin?
items.answer: We're currently developing a Figma plugin. Join our waitlist to be notified when it's ready.
